news: [Feature] Help the community and translate jSQL into your language. Click on the top right button to show the advanced settings and open menu Community, choose a language using 'I help translate jSQL' and translate some text then click on Send. Your translation will be integrated to the next release by the developer.
[Hiring] ProGuard shrinking. Apache PHP, Python and Node API Devops integration on Travis CI.
[Roadmap] Burp integration, Dump to a file, Full Path Disclosure, WAF detection.
[Done] Bypass WAF with tamper, Devops pipeline with dockerized SQL Server.
